pages.text:
Events & Parties
Book Your Parties and Events With Us
Themed parties or corporate events!!
Rent the lobby or the theater for your themed event. Just give us a deposit and a budget and we can plan the whole thing…or you can do your own decorating…possibilities are endless!
Pick your theme….we can do weddings, graduations, singles mixers, and any kind of church outing!!
We have a few different packages that start as low as $275. Pricing varies based on party type. This is for a private birthday party which gives your child and all of their friends the ultimate movie experience. The theater all to themselves in our VIP Party with the *LUXURY RECLINING SEATS* ($25 cleaning fee also added)**(Amount of fee is for cleaning within reason. This fee will increase if the theater is intentionally disrespected and requires a lengthy amount of time to restore it back to it’s prior condition)** Custom Movie Magic Birthday Party packages also available to make your child’s day super spectacular! Don’t forget to ask about our X-Box parties…where else can you play with your friends on a 24 foot screen???
WE’VE ALSO ADDED AN ARCADE NEXT DOOR!! We  have games suitable for ALL ages!
Level up party options
Minimum of 10 people, maximum of 15 people
Option 1: 21.99 per person plus tax
Birthday kid gets a $15 game card
$10 game card for party guests
Option 2: $29.99 per person plus tax
Birthday kid gets a $25 game card              $20 game card for party guests
ALL party options come with
*2 lg Pizzas choice of cheese or pepperoni
*Unlimited fountain drinks (party guests only)
Party room
*Cups, plates, napkins, utensils.
*Birthday kiddo automatically receives 400 tickets for redemption on their play card.
*Party attendant.
You can also do a special add-on for $8.50 per person plus tax to include Unlimited Play on all Non-Ticketing /Non-Merchandise Video Games. These would include Racing Games, Jurassic Park, Halo, Buck Hunter, Dracon, Air Hockey, Pinball and Pacman.
prlevelup2024@gmail.com to book
Party Packages
Birthday Package
Our VIP party includes admission for up to 10 guests for movies that are within the first 4 weeks of the release date. Admission is $10 per person over that.
For movies greater than 4 weeks old, DVD, or streaming movies, your guest count would be up to 15 people included, and then the $10 per person over that.
Party Enhancement Package
Our next level package in which you start adding your snacks and food. Depending on the number of people attending we can add a popcorn and drink for each person for $6 p/p. You can add Pizzas, Chicken tenders, fries, mozz sticks, mac n cheese bite platters as well. Those are priced per person, with a $50 minimum order.
X-box/Playstation/Switch Gaming Parties
Gaming on the big screen starting at just $100.00 for 1 hour of game play! Add another 30 min for just $65 more. Just bring your console, games, and controllers in and play on a 24 ft screen with amazing picture and sound! Screen can split into 4 player just like at home.
Movie Magic Birthday Party Packages
Completely customized Movie Magic Birthday Party packages also available. You also are NOT limited to just the movies we have playing right now. Customize a themed party, Super Heroes, Princesses, Ninja Turtles, Grease, etc…the possibilities are endless! Just bring in your own BluRay and make it happen! You may bring your own cake, cupcakes, cookie cake, etc. We set up a gift table for you inside of your theater.. Any specific decorations can be dropped off the night before and we will set up completely. Here is the BEST part, WE DO ALL OF THE CLEANUP!
Our parties are held at 10 am with your rental running through 12 – 12:30 pm depending on availability.
Message us through here or stop in with any questions you may have. We can customize a package based on your needs and expectations. Send us an email for further information to THEATERINFOC6@GMAIL.COM
